description: Detects remote RPC calls to collect information Author: Sagie Dulce, Dekel Paz. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Remote Registry Recon
query: ((EventLog:"RPCFW" AND winlog.event_id:"3" AND InterfaceUuid:"338cd001\-2244\-31f1\-aaaa\-900038001003") AND (NOT (OpNum:("6" OR "7" OR "8" OR "13" OR "18" OR "19" OR "21" OR "22" OR "23" OR "35"))))
